entries.title: The Far Side comic 3 for August 12, 2024

summary.caption:
“And now the weather—well, doggone it, but I’m afraid that
 cold front I told you about yesterday is just baaarrrely going to miss us.”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 4 for August 12, 2024

summary.caption: “Ooo! Look, Leon! An entire family of meatchucks!”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 5 for August 12, 2024

summary.caption:
“Don’t listen to him, George. He didn’t
catch it ... the stupid thing swerved to miss him and ran into a tree.”
